trans-unit.source: getnative is a language learning resource for advanced speakers
trans-unit.note: A one sentence description of the purpose of the website
banner description

trans-unit.source: A language learning resource for advanced speakers
trans-unit.note: A short description of the purpose of the website
headline

trans-unit.source: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci assumenda at culpaducimus fugiat impeditiure nobis repellendus. Accusamus consectetur dicta?
trans-unit.note: A brief description of the purpose of the website
headline paragraph
The title of the video database feature description
video db feature title

trans-unit.source: Get native is all about breaking the barrier between fluid speech and native like speech. Our way of breaking the barrier is through intensive observation, pronunciation practice and active learning using video interviews of native speakers. Needless to say in order for this to work we need a lot of interview videos!
trans-unit.note: The description of the video database feature
video db feature description
The title of the study session feature description
study session feature title

trans-unit.source: Wouldn't it be awesome to have an intense language study session in 15 minutes, or even 10? If you're an Advanced learner of the language you may already have your own study routine. But that study routine might include getting out books, scrolling through web pages -- it could take up to 10 minutes just to get all the materials ready!
trans-unit.note: The description of the study session feature
study session feature description

trans-unit.source: A tool for advanced language learners
trans-unit.note: The title for the advanced material feature description
advanced material feature title

trans-unit.source: getnative is most useful to language learners who already have a good command of the target language, yet want to make the speech sound more like that of a native speaker. Finding good study material is easy when you've just set out learning the target language. But as you advance, every day material like newspapers, journal articles, TV, podcasts and conversations with other speakers might become the core of your study routine.
trans-unit.note: The description for the advanced material feature
advanced material feature description

other features section title
